 2.4 - NAVIGABLE
PAGE BREAK NAVIGATION(LEVEL A)
On accessible websites...

[New]

For web content with page break locators, a mechanism is available to navigate
to each locator.

These websites...

Provide ways to help users navigate, find content, and determine where they are.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
An electronic publication (EPUB) document includes navigation to page number
references that match the print version of the publication. I still don't really
understand
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG22/Understanding/page-break-navigation.html#examples]

Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 21 May 2021 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2021/WD-WCAG22-20210521/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)
